preqs: ECC4650 or ECF5410 or with permission

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06}
(Must have passed 1 units in {ECC4650, ECF5410} OR  Permission required)
For COURSE_CODE IN {3842} Do Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ECC4650, ECX5465} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS} Otherwise true
Unit was previously coded {ECC4750%, ECC5475, ECO4750, ECO5820}
For COURSE_CODE IN {3842, B6001} Do Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ECC4650, ECF5410} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS} Otherwise true
Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06}
Unit was previously coded {ECC4750%, ECC5475, ECO4750, ECO5820}

description: Theories of hedging and speculation; determination of spot and futures prices, and intertemporal allocation; market efficiency; expectations, including adaptive expectations and rational expectations.
